$interpreted: Nikola: Stop hiding. I know you've been following me for a while now.
Nikola: You thought that I was the type of kindhearted old man who'd adopt an orphan beggar from the streets out of pity?
Nikola: If that's your purpose for following me, I advise you give up.
Child: ......
Child: ... Ugghh!
Nikola: You couldn't fool me by playing pity, so now you fake an illness? Hmph, that's why I said that brats these days... Hmm?
Nikola: ... This... Are you...
Hyde: ... Didn't expect the symptoms to surface now... Ugh,...
Errand Soldier: Hey, are you alright?
Hyde: Kingdom of the Sun soldier?
Hyde: I'm fine, but we should leave this area as soon as possible...
Messenger Soldier: It's the beasts who inhabit this area!
Hyde: Let me help!
Messenger Soldier: Thank you. You really helped us back there.
Hyde: It's me who has to thank you guys...
Hyde: By the way... this place is not exactly close to Kingdom of the Sun. Why are you two here? Do you have some kind of military mission?
Errand Soldier: To be honest, we're here on the orders of Regent Theodore. He wants us to visit the nearby village and locate a former minister name Nikola.
Errand Soldier: Have you ever heard of this person?
Hyde: Absolutely! I don't just know him; he's my teacher.
Messenger Soldier: That's great to hear! Can you please introduce us to him?
Hyde: You two helped me out. Of course I will take you to see Master. Only one problem... please remember to protect yourself when you meet him.
Nikola: **** OFF !!

Nikola: Tell that Regent brat;
stop trying to interfere with my retirement life!

Messenger Soldier: But... in order to prepare for the kingdom's 200th anniversary next year, Regent Theodore is already working around the clock.
He doesn't have the strength or time to handle other issues now.
Messenger Soldier: That's why he wanted to ask Minister Nikola to...
Nikola: You still talking? I said **** off!

Hyde: Calling Regent Theodore a brat... 
In the entire Kingdom of the Sun, I bet Master is the only one who's got the guts to say that.
Nikola: You don't get to laugh! You know my attitude very well. Why did you still bring the kingdom soldiers here?
Hyde: I can't really turn down their request. After all, those two soldiers did help me when my symptoms surfaced...
Nikola: ... Is it the void disease?
Hyde: Yes. The intervals between the symptom triggers seem to become more and more unstable...
Nikola: If that's all you're here for, go back to the school. The homework of those kids is still unmarked!
Hyde: Understood, Master Nikola.
Hyde: Ah, right, Master. The place where my symptoms surfaced is exactly where we first met each other!
Nikola: Stop talking about the past! That was long ago!
Hyde: Master even said back then...
Hyde: "I'm not a kindhearted old man who'd adopt an orphan beggar from the streets simply out of pity!"
Hyde: Yet in the end, you took me home anyway and you raised me to where I am now~
Nikola: Don't mention me in such a positive light. You're the one who refused to leave!
Nikola: You little rascal; if I knew this was going to happen, I wouldn't have taken you in as my disciple in the first place!

Model.Text: Stop hiding. I know you've been following me for a while now.
You thought that I was the type of kindhearted old man who'd adopt an orphan beggar from the streets out of pity?
If that's your purpose for following me, I advise you give up.
... Ugghh!
You couldn't fool me by playing pity, so now you fake an illness? Hmph, that's why I said that brats these days... Hmm?
... This... Are you...
... Didn't expect the symptoms to surface now... Ugh,...
Hey, are you alright?
Kingdom of the Sun soldier?
I'm fine, but we should leave this area as soon as possible...
It's the beasts who inhabit this area!
Let me help!
Thank you. You really helped us back there.
It's me who has to thank you guys...
By the way... this place is not exactly close to Kingdom of the Sun. Why are you two here? Do you have some kind of military mission?
To be honest, we're here on the orders of Regent Theodore. He wants us to visit the nearby village and locate a former minister name Nikola.
Have you ever heard of this person?
Absolutely! I don't just know him; he's my teacher.
That's great to hear! Can you please introduce us to him?
You two helped me out. Of course I will take you to see Master. Only one problem... please remember to protect yourself when you meet him.

Tell that Regent brat;
stop trying to interfere with my retirement life!

But... in order to prepare for the kingdom's 200th anniversary next year, Regent Theodore is already working around the clock.
He doesn't have the strength or time to handle other issues now.
That's why he wanted to ask Minister Nikola to...
You still talking? I said **** off!

Calling Regent Theodore a brat... 
In the entire Kingdom of the Sun, I bet Master is the only one who's got the guts to say that.
You don't get to laugh! You know my attitude very well. Why did you still bring the kingdom soldiers here?
I can't really turn down their request. After all, those two soldiers did help me when my symptoms surfaced...
... Is it the void disease?
Yes. The intervals between the symptom triggers seem to become more and more unstable...
If that's all you're here for, go back to the school. The homework of those kids is still unmarked!
Understood, Master Nikola.
Ah, right, Master. The place where my symptoms surfaced is exactly where we first met each other!
Stop talking about the past! That was long ago!
Master even said back then...
"I'm not a kindhearted old man who'd adopt an orphan beggar from the streets simply out of pity!"
Yet in the end, you took me home anyway and you raised me to where I am now~
Don't mention me in such a positive light. You're the one who refused to leave!
You little rascal; if I knew this was going to happen, I wouldn't have taken you in as my disciple in the first place!
